Name: Delicious Milky Mushroom Crisp Tower
Desc: A crunchy delicacy. The faint creamy notes melt on your tongue as you munch on the succulent mushrooms and crispy bread. This unmatched sense of satisfaction somehow leaves you insatiable â€” you do not even hesitate to lick the bread crumbs off your fingertips.
Effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.
